actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A concurrent resolution encouraging the International Olympic Committee to select New York City as the site of the 2012 Olympic Games.

summary.text: Encourages the International Olympic Committee to choose New York City as the site of the 2012 Olympic Games. Expresses the hope that the United States will be selected as the host country of such Games and pledges cooperation and support for their successful fulfillment in the highest Olympic tradition.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution encouraging the International Olympic Committee to select New York City as the site of the 2012 Olympic Games.
